name: Empact Foundation Class Library
short_description:
Cross-platform C++ library for use as a default application framework. Supported features include:
* Threading & synchronization
* Socket programming including SSL
* File I/O utilities including support for zlib, .ini file
* Database access with native support for SQLite, ODBC and Postgre
* Built-in mini XML parser, but includes EXPAT and LIBXML support
* Network protocol stack: HTTP, FTP, SMTP, POP3, SOAP, XMLRPC
* Parsers for network standards: HTML, WIKIML, UDDI, RSS, ATOM
* C++ Inteface to scripting languages: Perl, Python, JavaScript, VBScript, Java  
* Encryption library based on OpenSSL
* Application skeleton for console & daemon services
* Comprehensive string class and string utilities.
* missing string functions ported to POSIX standards.
* Utility library includes: any variant, object persistence, design patterns templates and advanced data structures.
* File format support: JSON, YAML.
summary: Cross-platform C++ library for use as a default application framework.
